name: Blue Bayou
description: Blue Bayou can only be described as a comprehensive psychoactive experience. A true sativa, this peppy flower is optimal for a variety of cerebral ailments; patients report mood elevation and increased focus in particular. This strain may be suitable for a variety of applications including creative pursuits, focused work, or introspective exploration.
attributes_title: Giggly, Uplifted, Creative, Happy, Sleepy, Nausea, Stress, Depression, Headache, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
